title: Strong Relaxant
report: I decided to check out Leonotis leonurus. I found only one obscure trip report on the net. I smoked it in a pipe like mj and it gave a pretty strong relaxing effect. First it was barely noticeble, but as I smoked it more, it started to effect me more. Maybe it takes a time to be able to feel the effect. I even made tea of it, which worked really well too. But this stuff is for sure a strong relaxant.

erowid.citation: jsorex. "Strong Relaxant: experience with Leonotis leonurus (ID 1665)". Erowid.org. Sep 11, 2000. erowid.org/exp/1665
